titles.title: To prohibit Federal funds from being obligated or expended to promulgate Executive orders during a lapse in discretionary appropriations.
TRUMP Act
Termination of Reckless Unchecked Mandates from this President Act
TRUMP Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary:
Termination of Reckless Unchecked Mandates from this President Act or the TRUMP Act
This bill prohibits federal funds from being obligated or expended to promulgate or issue any executive order or presidential memorandum during a lapse in discretionary appropriations (i.e., government shutdown).
